title: What are some examples of industrial technologies? Is Energy one example of industrial technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: A popular example of new industrial technology is Internet of Things (IoT). IoT utilizes small sensors to capture data from a variety of industrial processes and products and then gathers and analyzes that data for predictive analytics. In my last company, we used sensors to monitor circuit breaker wear and tear so we could proactively repair or replace them before they had a maintenance issue. Many manufacturing plants, utilities and other industrial operations use IoT to improve plant reliability and maximize operational results.

Industrial technologies are technological innovations that directly impact production, especially when it increases productivity. the Bessemer process for making steelinjection molding of plasticsblown film processes to make plastic sheetingindustrial robots like welders and pick and place machines3D printing for manufacturing purposes
